title: Machine learning with tree-based models in R
slogan: A Free, Interactive Course about Tree-Based Models in R
description:
This is a free, open source course on machine learning with tree-based models in R. The course content was created by Erin LeDell (code exercises, scripts), with contributions by Gabriela de Queiroz (slides). Ines Montani designed the web framework that runs this course, and Florencia D'Andrea built the course website. The course logo was created using the flametree package by Danielle Navarro.

Contributions and comments on how to improve this course are welcome! Please file an issue or submit a pull request if you find something that could be fixed or improved.
bio: Hello! I'm Dr. Erin LeDell, Chief Machine Learning Scientist at H2O.ai and I love teaching data science! I am an author of several R packages, including the h2o package for machine learning. I am also the founder of the Women in Machine Learning & Data Science (WiMLDS) organization and co-founder of the R-Ladies Global organization.
